title: Who Was Hersh Goldberg-Polin, US Citizen Who Was Killed By Hamas In Gaza
content: Israeli-American hostage Hersh Goldberg-Polin was announced dead early Sunday morning by Israeli authorities. The 23-year-old was kidnapped by Hamas militants during the October 7 attack on southern Israel.
summary: Israeli-American hostage Hersh Goldberg-Polin was announced dead early Sunday morning by Israeli authorities. The 23-year-old was kidnapped by Hamas militants during the October 7 attack on southern Israel.

title: Wind, Rain Make Search For Missing Russian Helicopter With 22 Aboard Difficult
content: More than 60 people were battling heavy winds and rains on Sunday searching for a Russian helicopter that went missing the day before with 22 aboard in the far eastern peninsula of Kamchatka, the emergencies ministry said.
summary: More than 60 people were battling heavy winds and rains on Sunday searching for a Russian helicopter that went missing the day before with 22 aboard in the far eastern peninsula of Kamchatka, the emergencies ministry said.

title: Photographer Captures Most Detailed Photos Of Moon Ever Taken. See Here
content: Darya Kawa Mirza's photograph, which he described as the "clearest and sharpest Moon image" he has ever captured, was the result of four days of continuous observation and shooting.Â
summary: Darya Kawa Mirza's photograph, which he described as the "clearest and sharpest Moon image" he has ever captured, was the result of four days of continuous observation and shooting.

title: Houthi Rebels Say They Attacked Merchant Ship Off Yemen
content: Yemen's Iran-backed Houthi rebels said Saturday they had attacked a merchant ship in the Gulf of Aden, as a multinational naval force said two missiles exploded near a Liberia-flagged vessel.
summary: Yemen's Iran-backed Houthi rebels said Saturday they had attacked a merchant ship in the Gulf of Aden, as a multinational naval force said two missiles exploded near a Liberia-flagged vessel.

title: Ukrainian Drones Target Oil Refinery, Power Plants In Moscow, Says Russia
content: Russia said Sunday that it had thwarted a "massive" Ukrainian drone attack by downing 158 drones across 15 regions, including two over the capital Moscow.
summary: Russia said Sunday that it had thwarted a "massive" Ukrainian drone attack by downing 158 drones across 15 regions, including two over the capital Moscow.

title: China Woman Fakes Miscarriages, Forges Medical Records To Claim Rs 7.8 Lakh
content: She created convincing documents, including a maternity certificate and discharge summary, falsely claiming hospitalisation for a miscarriage.
summary: She created convincing documents, including a maternity certificate and discharge summary, falsely claiming hospitalisation for a miscarriage.

title: Thousands In Australia Without Power Amid Heavy Rain
content: Tens of thousands of people in Australia's southern island state of Tasmania were without power on Sunday after a cold front brought damaging winds and heavy rains, sparking flood warnings.
summary: Tens of thousands of people in Australia's southern island state of Tasmania were without power on Sunday after a cold front brought damaging winds and heavy rains, sparking flood warnings.

title: Explained: Mexico's Judicial Reform Plan And The Controversy Around It
content: Judicial reforms championed by Mexico's outgoing president, Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador, and supported by his incoming successor have sparked diplomatic tensions with the United States and upset financial markets.
summary: Judicial reforms championed by Mexico's outgoing president, Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador, and supported by his incoming successor have sparked diplomatic tensions with the United States and upset financial markets.

title: Hostages "Brutally Murdered" Shortly Before We Reached Them: Israel
content: The Israeli military announced today that it had discovered the bodies of six hostages in an underground tunnel in the southern Gaza Strip.
summary: The Israeli military announced today that it had discovered the bodies of six hostages in an underground tunnel in the southern Gaza Strip.

title: US Teacher Arrested For Holding Autistic Child In Headlock Using Her Legs
content: A 59-year-old teacher at Forest Lake Elementary in Volusia County was arrested on Saturday for allegedly using her legs to put a 3-year-old student in a headlock during class.
summary: A 59-year-old teacher at Forest Lake Elementary in Volusia County was arrested on Saturday for allegedly using her legs to put a 3-year-old student in a headlock during class.

title: "Time This War Ended": Biden After Bodies Of 6 Hostages Found In Gaza
content: US President Joe Biden said he was "devastated and outraged" over the recovery of six bodies of hostages, including that of an Israeli-American from the Gaza Strip.
summary: US President Joe Biden said he was "devastated and outraged" over the recovery of six bodies of hostages, including that of an Israeli-American from the Gaza Strip.

title: Far-Right Could Win In Germany State Polls For The First Time
content: Germans head to the polls in two eastern states on Sunday, with the far-right AfD on track to win a state election for the first time and Chancellor Olaf Scholz's coalition set to receive a drubbing just a year before federal elections.
summary: Germans head to the polls in two eastern states on Sunday, with the far-right AfD on track to win a state election for the first time and Chancellor Olaf Scholz's coalition set to receive a drubbing just a year before federal elections.

title: "It's Mom, I Love You": Mother Of Israeli-American Found Dead In Gaza
content: The Israeli Defense Forces have located and recovered the bodies of six hostages, including US citizen Hersh Goldberg-Polin, from Gaza. The bodies were found in a tunnel under the city of Rafah.
summary: The Israeli Defense Forces have located and recovered the bodies of six hostages, including US citizen Hersh Goldberg-Polin, from Gaza. The bodies were found in a tunnel under the city of Rafah.

title: Human Remains Found Under Home Of Missing Couple Living In Nudist Colony
content: Police used a tank-like vehicle to smash into the home of Michael Royce Sparks, 62, where they believed the bodies would be found.
summary: Police used a tank-like vehicle to smash into the home of Michael Royce Sparks, 62, where they believed the bodies would be found.

title: Biden Says Body Of Israeli-American Found Among 6 Hamas Hostages In Gaza
content: US President Joe Biden said Saturday that the body of Israeli-American hostage Hersh Goldberg-Polin was among six recovered in Gaza by Israeli forces.
summary: US President Joe Biden said Saturday that the body of Israeli-American hostage Hersh Goldberg-Polin was among six recovered in Gaza by Israeli forces.

title: Shanghai Museum's 'Meow Night' Draws Crowds With Ancient Egyptian Cat Relics
content: Shanghai Museum has pulled in crowds this summer for an exhibition of ancient Egyptian relics including cat statues and other feline imagery, which on Saturday nights allows up to 200 visitors to bring along their own four-legged friends.
summary: Shanghai Museum has pulled in crowds this summer for an exhibition of ancient Egyptian relics including cat statues and other feline imagery, which on Saturday nights allows up to 200 visitors to bring along their own four-legged friends.

title: Mining Tycoon's New Diktat: Don't Go Out For Coffee During Work Hours
content: Do not leave the building, or take a coffee break - these are among the new instructions an Australian mining boss plans to give all his employees.
summary: Do not leave the building, or take a coffee break - these are among the new instructions an Australian mining boss plans to give all his employees.

title: 3 Foreign Workers Trapped in Collapsed Thai Tunnel Found Dead
content: Preliminary investigations suggest that asphyxiation due to oxygen deprivation was the probable cause of death.
summary: Preliminary investigations suggest that asphyxiation due to oxygen deprivation was the probable cause of death.

title: "Unstable Uncle": Internet Reacts To Viral Donald Trump Dance Video
content: Former US President Donald Trump's dance moves at a public event on Friday have taken social media by storm. The annual Moms for Liberty event, held in Washington DC, saw 78-year-old Tump shake a leg on stage with the group's co-founder.
summary: Former US President Donald Trump's dance moves at a public event on Friday have taken social media by storm. The annual Moms for Liberty event, held in Washington DC, saw 78-year-old Tump shake a leg on stage with the group's co-founder.

title: Over 700 Protestors Sent To Security Jails In Venezuela After Elections
content: More than 700 people arrested during protests that erupted after Venezuela's disputed presidential election have been transferred to maximum security prisons, a human rights group said Saturday.
summary: More than 700 people arrested during protests that erupted after Venezuela's disputed presidential election have been transferred to maximum security prisons, a human rights group said Saturday.
